sense.def:
Z izrazom
specific
poudarimo, da govorimo prav o določeni stvari ali vsebini.

seg.quote: Education should not be restricted to any one specific age group.
On certain specific issues there may be changes of emphasis.

sense.def:
Opis je
specific
, kadar je podroben in točen.

seg.quote: It was a tooth, a tiger-shark tooth, to be more specific.

sense.def:
Kar je
specific to a particular thing
, je povezano samo z določeno stvarjo.

seg.quote: It's the program that's specific to this problem.

sense.def:
The specifics of a subject
so podrobnosti neke teme.

seg.quote: Let us focus on the specifics of Bengal's life.
